mapper.select: SELECT su.realname,su.id,su.username,su.email,su.phone,su.work_no FROM sys_user_position sup INNER JOIN sys_user su on sup.user_id = su.id and su.del_flag = 0 WHERE sup.position_id = #{positionId} ORDER BY sup.create_time DESC
SELECT position_id FROM sys_user_position WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
